body:
**This PR is based on #14711, so review comments for initial commits should be posted there.**

---

This PR and its base PRs #14437 and #14711 are refactoring changes that do not affect behavior. These changes:

1. Create an abstract [`Chain`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/blob/pr/wipc-sep/src/interfaces/chain.h) interface in [`src/interfaces/`](https://github.com/ryanofsky/bitcoin/tree/pr/wipc-sep/src/interfaces).
1. Update wallet code to call the new interface. This largely consists of diffs of the form:

```diff
-    wtx.nTimeReceived = GetAdjustedTime();
+    wtx.nTimeReceived = m_chain->getAdjustedTime();
```

These changes allow followup PR #10102 (multiprocess gui & wallet PR) to work without any significant updates to wallet code. Additionally:

* They provides a single place to describe the interface between wallet and node code.
* They can make better wallet testing possible, because the `Chain` object consists of virtual methods that can be overloaded for mocking.
